Trade/Device Name(s): VALIDATE® D-Dimer Calibration Verification/Linearity Test Kit
Regulation Name(s): Multipurpose system for in vitro coagulation studies
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VALIDATE® D-Dimer Calibration Verification/Linearity Test Kit for in vitro determination of D-Dimer linearity and calibration verification in plasma
Indications for Use Summary: Assayed quality control material for in vitro diagnostic use in the quantitative determination of linearity, calibration verification and verification of reportable range for D-Dimer in plasma by laboratory personnel on automated analyzers
